Package services

Class InternshipService

java.lang.Object
services.InternshipService
public class InternshipService extends Object
Service class providing internship retrieval and filtering operations. Handles student eligibility checks and various internship listing methods.

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableInternshipsForStudent

      public List<InternshipOpportunity> getAvailableInternshipsForStudent(Student student, List<CompanyRepresentative> reps)
      Gets available internships for a student based on eligibility criteria. Filters by approval status, visibility, dates, major match, and academic level.

    • getAllInternships

      public List<InternshipOpportunity> getAllInternships(List<CompanyRepresentative> reps)
      Gets all internships from all company representatives regardless of status.

    • getPendingInternships

      public List<InternshipOpportunity> getPendingInternships(List<CompanyRepresentative> reps)
      Gets all pending internships awaiting staff approval.

    • getApprovedInternships

      public List<InternshipOpportunity> getApprovedInternships(List<CompanyRepresentative> reps)
      Gets all approved internships from company representatives.

    • findInternshipByTitle

      public InternshipOpportunity findInternshipByTitle(List<CompanyRepresentative> reps, String title)
      Finds an internship by title across all company representatives. Search is case-insensitive.
